alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 01 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota, including the following counties, in west central Minnesota, Clay. In southeast North Dakota, Cass. * WHEN...Until 830 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas where there is a lot of pavement. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 428 PM CDT, Trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fargo, Moorhead, West Fargo, Dilworth, Horace, Harwood, Sabin, Reile`s Acres, Oakport, Frontier, Prairie Rose, Briarwood, North River, Rustad, Wild Rice and Moorhead Airport.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
